tasks.label: Build-Opus3D-Debug
tasks.command: call .vscode\msvc-setup.bat && ( if exist build\windows-msvc-debug ( ninja -C build\windows-msvc-debug -v ) else ( meson setup build\windows-msvc-debug --buildtype=debug && ninja -C build\windows-msvc-debug -v ) )

tasks.label: Build-Opus3D-Release
tasks.command: call .vscode\msvc-setup.bat && ( if exist build\windows-msvc-release ( ninja -C build\windows-msvc-release -v ) else ( meson setup build\windows-msvc-release --buildtype=release && ninja -C build\windows-msvc-release -v ) )

tasks.label: Build-All
tasks.command: call .vscode\msvc-setup.bat && ( if exist build\windows-msvc-debug ( ninja -C build\windows-msvc-debug -v ) else ( meson setup build\windows-msvc-debug --buildtype=debug && ninja -C build\windows-msvc-debug -v ) ) && ( if exist build\windows-msvc-release ( ninja -C build\windows-msvc-release -v ) else ( meson setup build\windows-msvc-release --buildtype=release && ninja -C build\windows-msvc-release -v ) )
